mapper.insert: insert into Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance (id, device_Id, serial, region, submit_date, batch, longitude, latitude, PredatorsType, Release_Num, Pic, Worker, Remarks, scanId,username) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{predatorstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scanid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT count(Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance.id) FROM Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance WHERE username = #{username};
SELECT * FROM Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT #{num1},#{num2};
SELECT COUNT(Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance.id) FROM Device_NaturalEnemies_maintance WHERE username like "%"#{username}"%";
